steps.title: Pair two random words together to show off your sense of humor.
steps.content: Pair two random words together to show off your sense of humor. If you want to create a super original private story name, take a cue from Nickelodeonâ€™s hit show iCarly and smash two words together. You can choose an adjective and a noun, two nouns, or whatever word combo gives you the giggles. The more random and ridiculous, the better! Melon zit Taco party Spicy igloo Hairy raisin Elbow rage Tuna socks Sparkly foot Fries matter Evil cheeses Sweaty alien Doctor sushi Oily elevator Fudge patrol Jolly banana Rubber toast Lizard dance Church pants Electric spam Queasy onion Wobbly donut Liquid chicken Scuba donkey Coffee noodles Crunchy words Frozen ketchup Bouncy nachos Extra mothballs Cookie mischief Helpful meatballs Hot dog hoedown

steps.title: Open Snapchat and click on the profile icon in the top left-hand corner.
steps.content: Open Snapchat and click on the profile icon in the top left-hand corner. Under the â€œMy Storiesâ€ tab, select the â€œNew Private Storyâ€ button and choose who can view your story. Hit â€œCreate Storyâ€ at the bottom of the screen, then fill in the text box and click â€œDoneâ€ to save your story. The name of your story must be 30 characters or less (including spaces), and you can create up to 20 Private or Shared Stories at a time. [1] X Research source To rename a private story, click on your profile and click on the 3 dots to the right of your private story. Hit â€œRename Story,â€ then fill in the text box and click â€œDoneâ€ to save your changes.
